titles.title: Defunding United Nations Act of 2017
Defunding United Nations Act of 2017
To prohibit United States voluntary contributions to the regular budget of the United Nations or any United Nations agency, and for other purposes.
Defunding United Nations Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Defunding United Nations Act of 2017
This bill prohibits funds made available to any federal agency for FY2017 and subsequent fiscal years from being used to make U.S. voluntary contributions to the regular budget of the United Nations or any U.N. agency.
